name: Watercress Soup
keywords: appetizer, main course, leek, potato, watercress
recipeIngredient: Herb bouquet (parsley, bay leaf and thyme tied in cheesecloth)
Coarse salt and freshly ground pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Simmer the potatoes, leeks and herb bouquet in the chicken stock for 40 minutes. Trim the watercress stalks and discard. Add the watercress leaves to the soup reserving a few for decoration; simmer for five minutes.
Remove the herb bouquet. Puree the mixture in a food mill and cool it overnight.
Stir in yogurt and lemon juice to taste and season with salt and pepper. Serve the soup, sprinkled with watercress leaves, in individual bowls.
